nodes.name: FixedPoint
calculateMantissa
multiplyUint
divideUintByFixed
divideUintByMantissa
FixedPoint
calculateMantissa
multiplyUint
divideUintByFixed
divideUintByMantissa

params.divisor: The Fixed18 number to act as the divisor

divideUintByFixed(uint256,FixedPoint.Fix.return: An integer that is the result of dividing an integer by a Fixed18 number

params.mantissa: The fixed point 18 number to serve as the divisor

divideUintByMantissa(uint256,uint256).return: An integer that is the result of dividing an integer by a fixed point 18 mantissa

multiplyUint(FixedPoint.Fixed18 storage,.return: An integer that is the result of multiplying the params.

calculateMantissa(uint256,uint256).notice: Calculates a Fixed18 mantissa given the numerator and denominator   * The mantissa = (numerator * 1e18) / denominator

divideUintByFixed(uint256,FixedPoint.Fix.notice: Divides an integer by a Fixed18 number.

divideUintByMantissa(uint256,uint256).notice: Divides an integer by a fixed point 18 mantissa

multiplyUint(FixedPoint.Fixed18 storage,.notice: Multiplies a Fixed18 number by an integer.

userdoc.notice: Provides basic fixed point math calculations. * This library calculates integer fractions by scaling values by 1e18 then performing standard integer math.
